<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Update OIDC Configuration</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"put"} path={"/authn/api/v1/oauth2/config"}></MethodEndpoint>



Updates all the parameters of an existing OAuth2 configuration that is used by OpenID Connect(OIDC).

## Request

<MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>Body</h3><strong className={"openapi-schema__required"}>required</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"clientId"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Client ID obtained after Identity Provider(IdP) configuration."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"clientSecret"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Secret for the client id","writeOnly":true}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"issuer"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The identifier of the OpenID Connect(OIDC) provider."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"scopes"} required={true} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","description":"Identifiers used to specify what access privileges are being requested.","example":"[openid, email, profile]","items":{"type":"string","description":"Identifiers used to specify what access privileges are being requested.","example":"[openid, email, profile]"}}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"grantType"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`authorization_code`]"} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Grant types are a way to specify how a client wants to interact with an Identity Provider(IdP).","enum":["authorization_code"]}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"withPkce"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`true`, `false`]"} schema={{"type":"boolean","description":"Using proof key for code exchange(PKCE) as additional verification.  PKCE ensures that only the client that requests the access token can redeem it.","enum":[true,false]}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"idpAuthUri"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The URL of the authentication endpoint on the Identity Provider(IdP)."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"tokenUri"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The Identity Provider token endpoint URL for obtaining access and ID tokens."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"jwkSetUri"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The URL of the Identity Provider(IdP) JSON Web Key Set document.This document contains signing keys that are used to validate the signatures from the provider."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"endSessionUri"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The URL used to sign out the user from the Identity Provider(IdP)."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"isActive"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`true`, `false`]"} schema={{"type":"boolean","description":"True to enable SSO using OIDC; False otherwise.","enum":[true,false]}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"isJitEnabled"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`true`, `false`]"} schema={{"type":"boolean","description":"Is JIT enabled","enum":[true,false]}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"jitRoleClaimName"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Token claim providing the name of Prisma Cloud role for user."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"jitDefaultRoleId"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Default Prisma Cloud role to use for JIT when claim is missing or undefined."}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"204"} value={"204"}><div>

Successful operation

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"400"} value={"400"}><div>

error description
